summary: Request to migrate from the deprecated `grpc` package to `@grpc/grpc-js` for faster installations on Node 15+. Discussion reveals potential TLS/mTLS compatibility issues that were encountered in other Temporal projects.
userImpact: Users could benefit from faster package installations on Node 15+, but potential TLS issues need verification.
rootCause: Current dependency on deprecated `grpc` package; `@grpc/grpc-js` is pure JS alternative but has known TLS issues in some configurations
proposedFix: Migrate from `grpc` to `@grpc/grpc-js` package with proper TLS/mTLS configuration handling
workaround: Set GRPC_SSL_CIPHER_SUITES environment variable to address mTLS issues
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented; package migration was completed with TLS workaround documented
keyQuote: It's implemented in pure JS which should make installations on node 15 faster.
